    • Constructor Detail

      • PolylineBatch

        public PolylineBatch(Polyline polyline,
                     Color color,
                     float lineThickness,
                     int circleSegmentCount,
                     boolean isNestedBatch)
        Constructs a new PolylineBatch.
        Parameters:
        polyline - the Polyline to render
        color - the color of the polyline
        lineThickness - the thickness of the polyline line segments
        circleSegmentCount - the number of segments used to draw polyline vertex points
        isNestedBatch - a flag that specifies whether this RenderBatch is being rendered in a parent batch
